name: FATE (itch) (MARI12GAMESTUDIO)
description:
OPEN ALPHA 0.1.6

This is an early access look at our new upcoming RPG FATE. Nothing is finalized but since this is going to be our first "big" title we wanted to keep you updated with playable builds. #rpg #action #adventure #survival #analog

CONTROLS:

WASD for Movement

HOLD 1 for variable hud while in-game

E is to slash
